translation.en: [Pierre] The past… it is a dangerous place.
translation.fr: Le passé... est un endroit dangereux.

translation.en: So many decisions that can't be undone.
translation.fr: Tant de décisonsqu'on ne peut changer.

translation.en: So many ghosts.
In 1905, I accepted a job with the Romanovs,
translation.fr: En 1905, j'ai accepté un travailauprès des Romanov,

translation.en: Russia's royal family.
I saw their incredible wealth.
The palaces, the balls,
the jewelry.
-And then I saw the madness. -No!
translation.fr: - et j'ai vu la folie.- Non !

translation.en: The revolution.
It all ended here…
in this house
The richest family in the world,
the Emperor and the Empress of Russia, Nicholas and Alexandra…
translation.fr: le couple impérial russe,Nicholas et Alexandra...

translation.en: their five children…
vanished…
without a trace.
Now there are rumors of a survivor.
translation.fr: La rumeur parled'une survivante. BERLIN7 ANS APRÈS

translation.en: A deeply troubled girl in Berlin who claims to be Anastasia,
translation.fr: À Berlin, une fille très perturbéeprétend être Anastasia,

translation.en: the Romanovs' youngest daughter.
It is my task to see if she is telling the truth.
translation.fr: Ma tâche est de voirsi elle dit la vérité.

translation.en: [doctor] I understand they want you to identify her.
translation.fr: On m'a dit que vous étiez chargéde l'identifier.

translation.en: I worked in the family for 13 years.
translation.fr: J'ai travaillé auprès de la famillependant 13 ans.

translation.en: I was the children's tutor.
Please.
Ana, you have a visitor.
translation.fr: Ana, vous avez de la visite.

translation.en: She has retrograde amnesia.
Her memories are confused.
It's a common symptom.
Do you remember me?
[Pierre] In 1894,
Czar Alexander III died suddenly at the age of 49.
translation.fr: le tsar Alexandre III meurt soudainement,à l'âge de 49 ans.

translation.en: Russia was in shock.
His heir, Nicholas, was just 26.
translation.fr: Son héritier, Nicholas,avait tout juste 26 ans.

translation.en: [Sergei] Jesus, he's fucking rotting.
translation.fr: Il est en train de pourrir.

translation.en: You can't silence this, sweetheart, they've botched the embalming.
translation.fr: On ne peut pas le taire, chérie,il ont bâclé l'embaumement.

translation.en: He stinks.
[Ella, whispering] She already looks like an empress.
Let's just hope she's a good breeder.
Are you all right?
I'm sorry there's been no time for us.
translation.fr: Désolé de ne pas avoir eude temps pour nous.

translation.en: -Mother. -Oh!
-Thank you, Alix. -I'll take her outside.
translation.fr: - Merci, Alix.- Je sors avec elle.

translation.en: -I'll come. -No, no. You stay.
You'll be all right. I should go back.
translation.fr: Ça va aller.Je devrais y retourner.

translation.en: I worry about you so.
translation.fr: Je me fais du souci pour vous.

translation.en: The wedding, on top of all this.
translation.fr: Et le marriage,en plus de tout ça.

translation.en: [De Orellana] The young Nicholas II is quiet, indecisive,
translation.fr: Le jeune Nicholas II parle peu,est indécis...

translation.en: and very much living in the shadow of his great, imposing Grand Duke Uncle Sergei.
translation.fr: et vit dans l'ombre de son imposantgrand oncle Sergueï, un grand-duc.

translation.en: To be czar is to be field martial, emperor,
translation.fr: Être tsar, c'est être... AUTEUR, LES ROMANOV maréchal, empereur, premier ministre,tout ça,

translation.en: prime minister, all of these things,
pope, all rolled into one.
[De Orellana] This is like a medieval monarchy
where the czar has ultimate control over everything.
translation.fr: le tsar a le contrôleet le dernier mot sur tout.

translation.en: [Montefiore] And what man in the world is qualified for such a post?
translation.fr: Qui donc pourrait être qualifiépour un tel poste ?

translation.en: Get you through the next few hours, eh?
What am I going to do, Sandro?
I'm not ready to be Czar.
translation.fr: Je ne suis pas prêtà devenir tsar.

translation.en: You were born for this.
I can't run a country.
translation.fr: Je ne peux pasdiriger un pays.

translation.en: I have so much more to learn.
And who will teach me now?
You don't need a teacher.
Trust yourself. God chose you.
Divine bloody right.
[Hetherington] The Russian Empire that Nicholas II inherits
is one of the largest empires the world has ever seen.
translation.fr: est l'un des plus grands empiresde tous les temps.

translation.en: [Montefiore] It was colossal. It was a sixth of the world's surface.
translation.fr: Il était colossal,un sixième de la surfce mondiale.

translation.en: There were over 146 nationalities, many languages.
translation.fr: Il contenait plus de 146 nationalités,et bien des langues.

translation.en: And the Romanovs have ruled Russia for almost 300 years.
translation.fr: Les Romanov dirigeaient la Russiedepuis près de 300 ans.

translation.en: Their wealth is beyond computation.
An embarrassment of riches.
Land, gold mines, diamond mines,
translation.fr: Des terres, des mines d'or,des mines de diamant,

translation.en: the famous Fabergé eggs.
There are palaces everywhere.
Marrying into this world is Alexandra of Hesse,
translation.fr: Alexandra de Hesse rejointla famille par mariage.

translation.en: a shy, religious girl
translation.fr: C'est une fille timide et croyante,

translation.en: brought up in a tiny German principality.
If Catherine the Great wore them, so can you.
translation.fr: Catherine la Grande les a portées,vous pouvez les porter aussi.

translation.en: There.
Smile, Sunny.
Mother and Father would have been so proud of you.
translation.fr: Mère et père auraient étési fiers de vous.

translation.en: It's all right.
It's been a hell of a few weeks.
Are you sure it's not bad luck?
Having the wedding while we're all still mourning?
translation.fr: De se marierpendant une période de deuil ?

translation.en: The people say I come to them behind a coffin.
translation.fr: Le peuple dit quej'arrive derrière un cercueil.

translation.en: Well, that's not true.
I don't know the customs of this country.
translation.fr: Je ne connais pasles coutumes de ce pays.

translation.en: -I can't even speak Russian. -[laughs]
translation.fr: Je ne parle même pas russe.

translation.en: I can help with that.
I feel such an outsider.
I was a foreign princess once.
Head up.
Neck straight.
Carry the weight, proudly.
Welcome…
Czarina and Empress of all Russia.
translation.fr: tsarine, et impératricede toute la Russie.

translation.en: Now you're one of us.
translation.fr: Désormais, vous êtes l'une des nôtres.

translation.en: [De Orellana] Alexandra of Hesse is a granddaughter of Queen Victoria.
translation.fr: Alexandra de Hesse est la petite fillede la reine Victoria.

translation.en: She is deeply religious, and this obsession with religion
translation.fr: Elle est très croyante,et son obsession sur la religion

translation.en: plays a key role in her marriage to Nicholas
translation.fr: joue un rôle clédans son mariage avec Nicholas

translation.en: and in her role as Czarina of Russia.
translation.fr: et dans son rôle de tsarine russe.

translation.en: [Hetherington] This marriage is unusual as a Romanov marriage,
translation.fr: Ce mariage est inhabituelchez les Romanov,

translation.en: and for a royal marriage in general in this time period,
translation.fr: et pour un mariage en généralà cette époque là.

translation.en: and that's because it's very much a love match.
translation.fr: Et c'est parce qu'ils s'aiment vraiment.

translation.en: [Montefiore] They're one of the only royal couples in Europe that share a marital bed.
translation.fr: C'est l'un des seuls couples royauxen Europe à partager le lit conjugal.

translation.en: Well, Mrs. Romanov.
-Got it. -[Alix giggles]
There.
Sorry.
You know, my father was a great leader.
translation.fr: Vous savez,mon père était un grand chef.

translation.en: The people adored him.
It's not the people I worry about.
translation.fr: Je ne m'en fais paspour le peuple.

translation.en: It's your family.
You need to be strong.
[whispers] You're the czar.
Master of the land.
The leader of all Russia.
translation.fr: Le chef de toute la Russie.

translation.en: The God-given one.
Nothing will ever come between us.
-[horse whinnies] -[men shouting]
Come on. Come on.
You're either on my side…
translation.fr: Vous êtes soit de mon côté,

translation.en: or in my fucking way.
[Smith] Rasputin is one of the most remarkable figures of the 20th century.
translation.fr: Raspoutine est une personnalitéremarquable du XXe siècle.

translation.en: Okay, we can talk.
But his background is sort of shrouded in mist and legend.
translation.fr: Mais son passé légendaireest plein de mystère.

translation.en: [Rasputin] Shit.
[De Orellana] His parents were farmers and church elders.
translation.fr: Ses parents étaient des fermierset des ecclésiastiques.

translation.en: He was one of eight or nine siblings,
translation.fr: Il avait 7 ou 8 frères et sœurs,

translation.en: but it would seem that all of them died in his childhood.
translation.fr: mais ils sont tous mortsquand il était enfant.

translation.en: [Montefiore] Rasputin, he drinks, he fights with his father.
translation.fr: Raspoutine boit,et se bât avec son père.

translation.en: He chases girls.
But, above all,
he's ungovernable, he's fearless.
translation.fr: il est indomptable,n'a peur de rien.

translation.en: [man] Quiet!
The horse is safe.
Back in his stable.
I only borrowed it.
You stole it!
Thieves must be punished.
[crowd] Banish him! Banish him!
I don't want to be a thief.
translation.fr: Je ne veux pasêtre un voleur.

translation.en: But we got to eat, huh?
translation.fr: Mais on doit bien manger, non ?

translation.en: You've got to eat. You need to eat.
translation.fr: Vous en avez besoin. Vous aussi.

translation.en: I did a bad thing.
But I did it…
for my wife.
And my son.
What do you want to do with him?
-[woman 1] Banish him! -[crowd yelling angrily]
-[woman 2] Punish him! -What about my family?
You can't do this. You can't do this. Give me a chance, hmm?
translation.fr: Vous ne pouvez pas faire ça. Donnez-moi une chance.

translation.en: Give me a chance.
Send me on a pilgrimage, hmm?
Come on.
[man] This is my judgment:
go on a pilgrimage, turn to God,
but leave the village now.
Will you really go to the monastery?
I don't know.
I won't let you down. Promise.
I love you.
Rasputin's wife, Praskovya, is a very long-suffering figure.
translation.fr: La femme de Raspoutine, Praskovia,souffre depuis longtemps.

translation.en: It's hard to say if Praskovya loves Rasputin or not.
translation.fr: Difficile de diresi elle aime Raspoutine ou non.

translation.en: But she's a constant figure, a supportive figure.
When Rasputin picks up and leaves home as a pilgrim in 1897,
translation.fr: Quand Raspoutine quitte son foyerpour partir en pélerinage en 1897...

translation.en: he enters what might be considered his university.
translation.fr: il intègre, si on veut,son université.

translation.en: He sleeps out of doors,
he becomes infinitely aware of the beauty of the Russian landscape,
translation.fr: et devient pleinement conscientde la beauté des paysages russes,

translation.en: of Russian life, of folk ways.
translation.fr: de la vie russe,des coutumes du peuple.

translation.en: [Montefiore] He walked through all weathers,
translation.fr: Il marche par tous les temps,

translation.en: being soaked, being frozen, being sunburnt.
translation.fr: qu'il soit trempé, gelé,ou qu'il ait des coups de soleil.

translation.en: It was a really hard, strange, lonely life.
translation.fr: C'était une vie très dure,étrange, et solitaire.

translation.en: But one that got him closer to God.
translation.fr: Mais ça l'a rapproché de Dieu.

translation.en: [De Orellana] Away from the Siberian plains, Russia is changing ever faster.
translation.fr: Loin des plaines de Sibérie,la Russie change encore plus vite.

translation.en: [Montefiore] The telephone replaces the telegram.
Cars replace carriages.
Electric lights replace lamps.
Nicholas becomes Czar at the dawn of the modern age.
translation.fr: Nicholas devient tsarau début de l'époque moderne.

translation.en: [De Orellana] And Russia is industrializing at a breakneck speed,
translation.fr: Et la Russie s'industrialiseà un rythme effréné.

translation.en: hundreds of thousands of workers flock to the big cities,
translation.fr: Les travailleursarrivent en ville en masse,

translation.en: creating huge social change.
[Montefiore] They're building railways, building factories.
translation.fr: Ils construisent des chemins de fer,des usines.

translation.en: Conditions there are appalling, workers' rights are nonexistent.
translation.fr: Leurs conditions de travail sont atroces.Ils n'ont aucun droit.

translation.en: So there was a great hunger for new political institutions.
Nicholas' first speech as Czar
is a great opportunity for him to show what kind of ruler he wants to be.
translation.fr: est l'occasion pour lui de montrerla manière dont il veut gouverner.

translation.en: [Montefiore] In the early part of his reign,
Uncle Sergei is probably Nicky's most important advisor.
translation.fr: oncle Sergueï est le plus importantconseiller de Nicky.

translation.en: He's very dogmatic, extremely right wing.
translation.fr: Il est très dogmatique,très à droite politiquement.

translation.en: He's highly religious.
He's the ultimate Romanov hardliner.
[De Orellana] What Nicky is about to say is absolutely critical.
translation.fr: Ce que Nicky va dire est crucial.

translation.en: He can either embrace democracy and modernity like Western Europe,
translation.fr: Soit il adopte la démocratie et lamodernité comme l'Europe occidentale,

translation.en: or he can choose to remain an absolute monarch.
translation.fr: soit il choisitde rester un monarche absolu.

translation.en: [Nicky] I'm aware…
that recently in some zemstvos…
the people have been carried away with senseless dreams
translation.fr: le peuple s'est laissé emporterpar des rêves insensés

translation.en: of taking part in the business of government.
Let everyone know
that I will retain the principles of autocracy
translation.fr: que je protégerailes principes de l'autocratie...

translation.en: as firmly…
and unbendingly…
as my unforgettable late father.
[Montefiore] It's Sergei who tells him to give the speech,
translation.fr: Sergueï lui a ditde faire ce discours,

translation.en: and he encourages Nicholas to embrace sacred autocracy
translation.fr: il encourage Nicholasà sacraliser l'autocratie, à en faire

translation.en: as the only way to rule Russia.
translation.fr: le seul moyen de diriger la Russie.

translation.en: Good speech.
It's a terrible mistake. He stamps out any possibility of reform.
translation.fr: C'est une grave erreur.Il enterre toute possibilité de réforme.

translation.en: [Hetherington] By showing that he has no intention of sharing power democratically,
translation.fr: En montrant que partager le pouvoirest impensable pour lui,

translation.en: Nicholas lays the foundations of his own demise.
translation.fr: Nicholas crée le climat qui va entraînersa propre perte.

translation.en: [Smith] Rasputin visits various monasteries,
including Verkhoturye, which is one of the great monasteries of Russia.
translation.fr: y compris celui de Verkhoturye,l'un des plus grands de Russie.

translation.en: And he meets with the monks,
and he learns the gospels practically by heart.
translation.fr: et il apprend les évangiles par cœur.

translation.en: And he becomes steeped in Russian Orthodoxy.
But there's too much control,
translation.fr: Mais il y atrop de contrôle,

translation.en: there's too much order, there's too much discipline, there's too much routine.
translation.fr: trop d'ordre, trop de discipline,trop de routine.

translation.en: I can't find God here.
Come with me.
[Montefiore] Rasputin is a free spirit, and he seeks out some of the cults
translation.fr: Raspoutine est un électron libre.Il cherche des sectes

translation.en: who have a different and much more instinctive,
translation.fr: qui ont une approche différente,plus instinctive

translation.en: and much more passionate approach to religion.
translation.fr: et bien plus passionnée, de la religion.

translation.en: Be full of joy and gladness, for Christ has risen!
translation.fr: Soyez pleins de joie et d'allégresse,car le Christ a ressuscité !

translation.en: Be full of joy and gladness, for Christ has risen!
translation.fr: Soyez pleins de joie et d'allégresse,car le Christ a ressuscité !

translation.en: Be full of…
Oh, God! We feel you!
We feel your spirit, God!
We feel you!
We feel your spirit!
The Khlysty, which means "whips" in English,
are one of the most notorious of all Russian sects.
translation.fr: forment l'une des sectes russesles plus célèbres.

translation.en: They're illegal, they operate in secret…
translation.fr: Ils sont hors la loi,agissent en secret,

translation.en: …and they engage in all sorts of wild orgiastic rites and rituals.
translation.fr: et ils font toutes sortes de riteset rituels orgiaques.

translation.en: There's even talk that they cut off the breast of a virgin
translation.fr: On dit même qu'ils coupaientles sein d'une vierge

translation.en: and eat it at the end of their rites.
translation.fr: et le mangeaient à la fin du rite.

translation.en: But there is a logic that underlies it all.
translation.fr: Mais il y a une logique là-dessous.

translation.en: If one does not sin, one cannot repent.
translation.fr: Si on ne pèche pas,on ne peut pas se repentir.

translation.en: And without repenting, one cannot be saved.
translation.fr: Et sans ça,on ne peut pas être sauvé.

translation.en: And this suits Rasputin right down to the ground.
He's a man of enormous sexual appetite, he's a heavy drinker,
translation.fr: Il a un énorme appétit sexuel,il boit beaucoup,

translation.en: he loves women, and he adopts this idea of sin leading to redemption
translation.fr: Il adore les femmes,et il adopte l'idée du péché menant à la rédemption en tant queprincipe de base de sa propre foi.

translation.en: as the essence of his own faith.
translation.fr: menant à la rédemption en tant queprincipe de base de sa propre foi.

translation.en: Rasputin has a true religious experience,
translation.fr: Raspoutine est transcendé par la religion,

translation.en: and this launches him into becoming a holy pilgrim,
translation.fr: ce qui le fait devenirun pélerin saint,

translation.en: a new man imbued with religious fervor,
translation.fr: un homme nouveau,imprégné de ferveur religieuse,

translation.en: traversing across vast expanses of the empire for many years.
[De Orellana] For Nicky's coronation at the Khodynka Field,
people are invited to participate in a public feast
translation.fr: le peuple est invité à un festin,tout ceux qui le

translation.en: for anyone that wants to come.
There will be food and little commemorative gifts
translation.fr: Il y a de la nourritureet de petits cadeaux

translation.en: from the Czar to his people.
[Alexandrova] The gifts include a kerchief, a commemorative mug,
translation.fr: Ces cadeaux sont un foulard,une tasse commémorative,

translation.en: sausage, gingerbread, so it sounds wonderful to a regular Russian peasant.
translation.fr: du saucisson, du pain d'épices, et çaplait beaucoup aux paysans.

translation.en: They flocked to the field even before dawn,
translation.fr: Ils arrivent des champs avant l'aube,

translation.en: and some even walked on foot from Siberia in their Bass shoes.
translation.fr: certains sont même venus de Sibérieà pied, en mocassins.

translation.en: That's fine, I'm done.
[Sandro] Looking good.
-Feeling shit. -[Sandro laughs]
Couldn't sleep.
You know, you're lucky. You'll never know responsibility like mine.
translation.fr: Avec un peu de chance, vous n'aurezjamais tant de responsabilités.

translation.en: I'll never know money like yours either.
Or power.
Are you ready?
[sighs] As I'll ever be.
-Are you? -You wanted to see me?
How are the plans for Khodynka?
A fucking nightmare.
Too many peasants in one place, all wanting free food and drink.
translation.fr: Trop de paysans à un seul endroit,qui veulent tous boire et manger gratis.

translation.en: You should send more Cossacks for crowd control.
translation.fr: Vous devriez envoyerplus de Cosaques gérer ça.

translation.en: I don't want to waste time and money on Cossacks.
translation.fr: Je ne veux pas gâcher du tempset de l'argent avec eux.

translation.en: It will be fine.
Do you want me to go after him?
You'll only aggravate him.
Isn't that the point?
Today is about us.
[Monetfiore] Uncle Sergei is in charge of the public event,
and he really is expecting 2 or 300,000 peasants.
In fact, 800,000 peasants turn up.
translation.fr: En fait, il y a 800 000 paysans sur place.

translation.en: The problem is that this feast has been very badly organized by Uncle Sergei.
translation.fr: Le problème, c'est qu'oncle Sergueïa très mal organisé ce festin.

translation.en: The field has been torn apart by military exercises,
translation.fr: Le champ a été éventrépar des exercices militaires,

translation.en: and only a few planks have been put down to cover deep trenches.
translation.fr: et peu de planches ont été installéespour couvrir les tranchées.

translation.en: There are very few policemen to keep security.
translation.fr: Il n'y a quepeu de policiers.

translation.en: [Alexandrova] The people in the stalls start panicking.
translation.fr: Les gens sur les gradinsse mettent à paniquer.

translation.en: They start hurling those packages into the crowd.
translation.fr: On commence à jeterdes paquets à la foule.

translation.en: Everyone starts to rush towards where they believe the presents are being given.
translation.fr: Tout le monde se rue là où ils croientqu'on distribue les cadeaux.

translation.en: [Alexandrova] People start falling to the ground,
human dominoes, other people trample upon them.
translation.fr: tels des dominos,et se font piétiner par d'autres.

translation.en: This scene is horrible carnage.
[Montefiore] The coronation of a Russian Czar was magnificent,
translation.fr: Le couronnement d'un tsar russeétait magnifique, majestueux,

translation.en: majestic, jewel-infested, exquisite.
translation.fr: Le couronnement d'un tsar russeétait magnifique, majestueux, plein de bijoux, exquis,et coûtait une somme extraordinaire.

translation.en: The cost was extraordinary.
translation.fr: plein de bijoux, exquis,et coûtait une somme extraordinaire.

translation.en: The rituals were complex and ancient.
translation.fr: Les rituels en étaient complexeset anciens.

translation.en: Everything was designed to project wealth,
translation.fr: Tout était fait pour projeter la richesse,

translation.en: power, and the glory of the dynasty.
translation.fr: le pouvoir, et la gloire de la dynastie.

translation.en: The coronation really defines the emperor
as a ruler whose power comes from God.
translation.fr: un monarche dont le pouvoir vient de Dieu.

translation.en: And Nicholas completely believes this and embraces it.
translation.fr: Nicholas croit totalement en cette idée,et l'adopte.

translation.en: [whispering] It doesn't mean anything.
Oh, Lord, God of our fathers.
translation.fr: Ô, Seigneur, Dieu de nos pères.

translation.en: You have chosen me as sovereign and judge over your people.
translation.fr: Tu m'as choisi comme souverain,et juge, de ton peuple.

translation.en: I confess to your inscrutable providence in selecting me.
translation.fr: Je me soumets à la providence insondablede ton choix.

translation.en: Inspire and enlighten my path,
and direct my actions in this awe-inspiring mission.
translation.fr: et guide mes actionsdans cette mission grandiose.

translation.en: May the wisdom that descends always from your throne…
translation.fr: Que la sagesse qui vient toujoursde ton trône...

translation.en: abide with me.
How many dead?
[Sergei] It is yet to be confirmed.
A hundred?
-More? -As I say, it is yet to be confirmed.
translation.fr: - Plus ?- Encore une fois, on attend confirmation.

translation.en: How many hundred?
Unfortunately, we are talking thousands-- Thousands?
translation.fr: - Malheureusement, on parle de milliers...- Des milliers ?

translation.en: It is yet to be confirmed.
We must cancel the celebrations. I would advise against that.
translation.fr: - Il faut annuler les festivités.- Je vous le déconseille.

translation.en: But surely we must acknowledge the tragedy.
translation.fr: Enfin, il faut bienréagir à cette tragédie.

translation.en: It is only a tragedy…
if you make it one.
translation.fr: si vous dites que c'en est une.

translation.en: Where you lead, others follow.
translation.fr: Vous dirigez...et les autres vous suivent.

translation.en: [Montefiore] 2000, 3000 bodies of peasants
lie on this coronation field, where soon there are to be festivities,
translation.fr: jonchent le lieu du couronnement,où doivent se tenir les festivités.

translation.en: the Czar, the Grand Duke, the Royal Family are to arrive.
translation.fr: Le tsar, le grand-duc,et la famille royale vont arriver.

translation.en: And some of the bodies they just pile into carts,
translation.fr: Certains cadavres sont tout simplementempilés sur des charriots.

translation.en: so that as the Royal Family are going out to the Khodynka Field,
translation.fr: Et quand la famille royalearrive au champ de Khonynka,

translation.en: they pass carriages where they think the people are waving at them,
translation.fr: ils croient qu'on les saluedepuis des charriots,

translation.en: and suddenly, as they get close, they realize
that these are all dead people, crushed to death.
translation.fr: que ce sont des mortsqui ont été écrasés.

translation.en: Nicky should have done what a modern politician would do:
translation.fr: Nicky aurait dû fairece que ferait un politicien moderne,

translation.en: go to all the hospitals, and be seen to be visiting and showing love for his people.
translation.fr: aller dans les hôpitaux, et se montrerplein de compassion pour son peuple.

translation.en: What he, in fact, does is to make a decision against his better judgment,
translation.fr: Au lieu de ça, il prendla terriblement mauvaise décision

translation.en: to go to the party of the Marquis de Montebello, the French ambassador.
translation.fr: d'aller à la fête du Marquisde Montebello, l'ambassadeur de France.

translation.en: [Alix] I can't. It's not right.
translation.fr: Je ne peux pas.Ce n'est pas bien.

translation.en: Just this one, then we'll have done our duty.
This will come back to haunt us.
There's no room for sentimentality in politics.
translation.fr: Il n'y a pas de placepour les sentiments en politique.

translation.en: You should have sent more Cossacks to manage the crowds.
translation.fr: Il aurait fallu envoyerplus de Cosaques.

translation.en: The people won't forgive him.
translation.fr: Le peuple ne le pardonnera pas.

translation.en: Grow up.
This blood will stain his reign.
translation.fr: Ce sang va entâcher son règne.

translation.en: Fucking kids.
[De Orellana] In the first day of his reign,
translation.fr: Le tout premier jour de son règne,le tsar et son épouse allemande

translation.en: the Czar and his German wife were dancing and drinking,
translation.fr: Le tout premier jour de son règne,le tsar et son épouse allemande dansent et boivent

translation.en: even as hundreds and thousands of Muscovites had been killed.
translation.fr: juste après la mortde milliers de moscovites.

translation.en: [Montefiore] And from this point onwards, he is known as Nicholas the Bloody.
translation.fr: À partir de ce moment là, on le surnomme"Nicholas le sanguinaire."

translation.en: It's a disastrous beginning to Nicholas' reign.
translation.fr: Début désastreux pourle règne de Nicholas.

translation.en: [Rasputin] Friend.
Would you have food and a bed for the night?
translation.fr: Auriez-vous à mangeret un lit pour la nuit ?

translation.en: -Of course. -Thank you.
Very nice, thank you.
What's all this shaking, old man?
Too many seasons.
Feel God flow in you again.
That's it. That's it.
[whispering] Breathe his spirit.
Remember how they ran.
The hills they climbed.
It's all still there.
Good.
[Smith] Rasputin becomes more and more convinced of his own abilities,
translation.fr: Raspoutine est de plus en plus convaincude ses propres capacités,

translation.en: of his power as a healer…
his insight into human nature.
[Montefiore] He's superb at getting close to people. He has empathy.
translation.fr: Il est très doué pour se rapprocherdes gens. Il a de l'empathie.

translation.en: He has a feral charisma.
[Smith] And then he has those eyes.
translation.fr: Et puis il a ces yeux.

translation.en: And he knows the effect that these eyes have on people.
translation.fr: Et il sait l'effet qu'ont ces yeuxsur les autres.

translation.en: Especially women.
It's all right to sin.
It brings us closer to God.
How can you be redeemed if you haven't sinned?
translation.fr: Comment pouvez-vous être rachetéeavant d'avoir péché ?

translation.en: [Smith] He's a man who emits electricity from his fingertips.
translation.fr: Cet homme a de l'électricitéau bout des doigts.

translation.en: His physical presence is something that overwhelms people.
translation.fr: Les gens sont dépasséspar sa présence.

translation.en: And people are transfixed by this.
[Montefiore] By 1901, Nicky and Alix have three daughters:
translation.fr: En 1901,Nicky et Alix ont trois filles... ST PÉTERSBOURG

translation.en: Olga, Tatiana, and Maria. And when Alix gets pregnant again…
translation.fr: Olga, Tatiana et Maria.Et quand Alix tombe encore enceinte...

translation.en: [Botkin] Breathe.
…everybody is longing for the much-needed son and heir.
translation.fr: tout le monde attend enfin un fils,un héritier.

translation.en: Oh, Lord, forgive us our sins.
May our prayers be answered.
We thank you for our daughters, but may you bless us now with a son.
translation.fr: Nous te remercions pour nos filles,mais offre-nous un garçon maintenant.

translation.en: -[Botkin] Push! Push it! -[shouts]
Tell me. [panting]
We have a beautiful, healthy baby.
translation.fr: Nous avons un beau bébé,en bonne santé.

translation.en: [gasps] I'm sorry!
A son would belong to the people.
This little girl is ours.
Hello, Anastasia.
[Pierre] In Greek,
the name Anastasia means, "the one who is reborn."
translation.fr: le nom Anastasia signifie :"celle qui renaît."

translation.en: Now I had to ask if she truly had been resurrected.
translation.fr: Je devais maintenant demandersi elle avait vraiment été ressuscitée.

translation.en: The eyes are the same.
But not the face.
There may be good reasons for that.
translation.fr: Il peut y avoirune raison à ça.

translation.en: Her jaw's been broken.
She has missing teeth.
She's been through serious emotional and physical trauma.
translation.fr: Elle a subi des traumatismesphysiques et mentaux.

translation.en: I don't know if anyone could have survived that massacre.
translation.fr: J'ignore si quiconque aurait pusurvivre à ce massacre.

translation.en: [Pierre] One thing that is certain
is that the birth of Anastasia was both a blessing and a curse.
translation.fr: la naissance d'Anastasia était autantune bénédiction qu'une malédiction.

translation.en: More than ever, Nicholas and Alexandra needed a son and heir.
translation.fr: Il fallait plus que jamais à Nicholaset à Alexandra un fils, un héritier.

translation.en: [whispers] Come back to bed.
We need help.
[Pierre] And their desperation would open a door…
translation.fr: Et leur désespoira ouvert une brèche...

translation.en: [Alix] There must be something we can do.
…to a darkness that would destroy their world.
translation.fr: sur des ténèbresqui allaient détruire leur vie.

translation.en: There must be someone.
Subtitle translation by: Nick Lombardi
